'''''Nouelia insignis''''' is a species of [[flowering plant]] in the [[Asteraceae]] family.
It is found only in [[China]].
It is threatened by [[habitat loss]].
==Source==
* World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998.  [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/32365/all Nouelia insignis].   [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ]  Downloaded on 20 July 2007.
